Package com.c301t19.cs.ualberta.seekaride.activities

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddRequestActivity
    Activity for a rider to create requests
    ChooseLocationActivity
    Activity responsible for all location searching and setting.
    DriverActivity
    Main activity for Drivers.
    DriversAdapter
    Extends ArrayAdapter to display a list of driver profiles.
    EditAccountActivity
    Activity to let a user change their account info
    EditRequestActivity
    Activity for a rider to edit a request they already made
    LoginActivity
    Launcher activity that allows users to login in.
    MapActivity Deprecated
    NewAccountActivity
    Activity to create a new account.
    PollingService
    Periodically polls the server to update Rider and Driver's openRequests and acceptedRequests.
    PollServerBroadcastReceiver
    A broadcast receiver that periodically makes calls to PollingService.
    RequestCompleteActivity
    Activity for the rider and driver which is displayed while the request is in progress.
    RequestsAdapter
    Extends ArrayAdapter to display a list of requests
    ReviewsAdapter
    Extends ArrayAdapter to display a user's reviews.
    RiderActivity
    Main screen for Riders, which shows the requests they currently have open.
    SearchRequestsActivity
    Activity for a driver to search for requests
    SearchResultsActivity
    Activity that takes parameters from SearchRequestsActivity, searches for requests with those parameters, and then prints them to a list that can be filtered by price and price per km
    ViewOfferActivity
    Activity for Drivers to view and accept requests.
    ViewProfileActivity
    Activity that lets users view each other's profiles.
